data.title: Directions

data.meta_site_name: WashULaw - Washington University School of Law
data.text:
BY CAR

From Downtown St. Louis and points East

Take I-64/40 West to the Clayton Road exit (#34B). At the top of the ramp, turn right onto Skinker Blvd. After approx. 1.25 miles, turn left onto Forest Park Pkwy. Proceed approx. ½ mile and turn left onto Throop Drive. To your left will be the Millbrook parking garage. Park in any available yellow spot. The Law School (Anheuser-Busch Hall) is to the right of the intersection of Throop Drive and Snow Way.

From the West or South via I-44E or I-55 North

Take I-64/40 East to the McCausland exit (#33D). Turn left off the exit ramp. After 1.5 miles, turn left onto Forest Park Pkwy. Proceed approx. ½ mile and turn left onto Throop Drive. To your left will be the Millbrook parking garage. Park in any available yellow spot. The Law School (Anheuser-Busch Hall) is to the right of the intersection of Throop Drive and Snow Way.

Find customized driving directions to Anheuser-Busch Hall.

Parking

Snow Way Garage – Visitor parking is conveniently located on the 4th level of the Snow Way Garage. The current parking fee is $15.00 per day or a prorated hourly rate. Payment will be required upon exiting the garage; credit cards are accepted. The Snow Way Garage is designated as number 97 on the Campus Parking Map.

BY METROLINK AND METROBUS

There are several Metro stations and bus lines that service the Danforth campus. Please visit the Metro website for station locations, bus stops and routes, schedules, and fare information.

BY AIR

Lambert-St. Louis International Airport

Taxis

If you are flying into Lambert International Airport, you can find taxis outside Exit MT 14 of the Main Terminal and Exit ET 12 and ET 14 of the East Terminal. Fares to Washington University will run about $30-$40, plus tips.

Uber and Lyft are also available for transportation from the airport to WashULaw.

Rental Cars

Airport/On-site: Rental car counters are located between Exits MT17 and MT12, lower level, Terminal 1.

Airport/Off-site: Call toll-free near Exits MT17 and MT12 in Terminal 1. Rental car shuttle vans pick-up outside Exit MT17 or in Terminal 2 outside Exit ET12.

Driving from the airport to WashULaw.

Public transportation from the airport to the WashULaw from St. Louis Lambert International Airport.

MetroLink is St. Louis’ light rail system. The airport stops are located on the upper level of the Main Terminal at Exit MT1 and the East Terminal through the parking garage on all levels. Please visit MetroLink for schedules and fares.

Getting Around

Getting around the university

The Law School is located in Anheuser-Busch Hall on the Danforth Campus of Washington University in St. Louis. Click here for a Campus Map.

The Danforth Campus is the heart of Washington University – which also includes the Medical Campus in the Central West End, North Campus, and West Campus locations. The Danforth Campus is very accessible, either on foot or by car.

Getting around the city

It’s easy to get around St. Louis. We suggest having access to a car during your visit, but if you don’t here are several transportation options.
